verses.1: “Ka nuntakna ka cimtak mahmah ta hi. Ka dahna thu ka ututin ka gen dinga, ka lungkham manin ka paupau ding hi.
verses.2: Pasian kiangah hih bangin ka ci ding hi: Kei hong mawhsak kei in. Kei nong langpanna thu hong gen in.
verses.3: Na khut tawh na sep sate simmawh bawlin, migiloteʼ vai panpihin, hih bangin nong netniamna ah bang phattuamna ngah na hi hiam?
verses.4: Mihing bang lelin gamta na hi hiam?
verses.5: Na nuntak hun tan koteʼ nuntak tan bang lelin ngaihsun na hi hiam?
verses.6: Bang hangin ka mawhna hong sulzuihin, ka khialhna khempeuh hong kantel na hi hiam?
verses.7: Ka mawh lohna na thei a, nang kiang panin kei hong hon ding a om lohna na theih sa mah ahi hi.
verses.8: “Nangma khut tawh kei hong lomin na hong piangsak a, tu-in nangma khut mah in kei hong leh suksiat hi.
verses.9: Leivui pan a kei nong bawlna hong phawkkik in. Leivui mahin hong deng vuikik takpi ding na hi hiam?
verses.10: Kei ka pian nadingin ka paʼ tungah tha na guan a, ka nuʼ sungah kei nong khangsak hi.
verses.11: Guh le thaguite tawh ka pumpi ding nong bawl a, sazang le vun tawh tua guhte nong tuamsak hi.
verses.12: Kei, nuntakna hong pia-in, nong it tawntung a, nangma hong kepna hangin kei ka nungta hi.
verses.13: Ahi zongin a beisa hunsung khempeuh ah kei ading thusim khat na neihna tu-in ka thei ta hi.
verses.14: Ka khialh khaknate hong ensim niloh na hih manin ka mawhnate hong maisak nuam lo na hi hi.
verses.15: Ka khialh phetin gim nong pia pah a, ka gamtat hoih ciangin zong nong pakta tuan kei hi. Mindaina le maizumna tawh kei ka kidim hi.
verses.16: Mavanna khatpeuh neisun leng zong, humpinelkai bangin ka siat nading na zong a, keiʼ gim theih nadingin nalamdang tuamtuam nangawn na bawl liang hi.
verses.17: Kei a hong langpang dingin teci na nei tawntung a, keima tungah na hehna hong khang semsem a, kei nong sukna ding thu thak na mu tawntung hi.
verses.18: “Pasian aw, bang hangin ka nuʼ sung panin kei hong piangsak peuhmah na hi hiam? Kuama hong muh ma-in a si hizaw hoh leng!
verses.19: Ka nuʼ sung pan hankhuk zuat pah ding pen mihing a pian loh zah mahin a hoih ahi hi.
verses.20: Keima nuntakna bei dektak ta hi lo ahi hiam? Hong hici omsak hoh in! Ka hun neih lai sunteng nuam takin hong zangsak in.
verses.21: Kei a pai baih ta ding ka hi a, a hong ciahkik ngei ding ka hi kei hi - khuamial, lungzinna gam,
verses.22: khuavak nangawn khuamial ahihna gam, khuamial gam, lungzinna gam, lungkhamna gam, a zuan ta ding ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
